==================

  * Initial release

0.0.2 / 2013-03-23
==================

  * better error handling for missing or wrong username
  * added demo/repl.js

0.0.3 / 2013-10-05
==================

  * use xy colorspace to demos (not all bulbs support ct)
  * don't bomb out on errors returned from bulbs in setAll()
  * updated dependencies
